Agatha Bennett (1919-2006) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A na-ejikọta ya na ndị Gee's Bend quilting collective, n'akụkụ nne di ya, Delia Bennett. A gụnyere ọrụ ya na nchịkọta nke High Museum of Art.
A mụrụ Bennett na Gee's Bend na Herbert Hall Wilkinson Plantation. Ọ bụ nne na nna ya ochie, Emma na Jacob Coleman zụlitere ya.  Ya na Rev
Pernell Bennett lụrụ di na 1940 ma zụlite ụmụ iri na anọ n'ọrụ ugbo, na-arụ ọrụ màkà ụlọ ọrụ na-etinye ihe n'ime ite, na ụlọ ọrụ na'ime osisi.
Bennett bụ ónyé otu Gee's Bend quilting collective.
Site na mkparịta ụka ya na di ya, Souls Grown Deep Foundation dere ndụ na mmepe nke Agatha dị ka ónyé na-ese akwa.
